mapper.select:
SELECT ALT_NO as altNo, ALT_CN as altCn, TRSM_YMD as trsmYmd, a.DMND_NO as dmndNo, si.DMND_NO as srInfoDmndNo, a.HSTRY_ID as hstryId, ALT_TYPE as altType
,si.SR_NO as srNo
FROM ALERT a, SR_INFORMATION_HISTORY h, SR_INFORMATION si, SR_DEMAND d WHERE RCVR_ID = #{rcvrId} AND IDNTY_YN = 0 AND a.HSTRY_ID = h.HSTRY_ID(+) AND h.SR_NO = si.SR_NO(+) AND si.DMND_NO = d.DMND_NO(+)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALERT (ALT_NO,ALT_CN,RCVR_ID, TRSM_YMD,DMND_NO,HSTRY_ID,ALT_TYPE) VALUES (ALT_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{altCn},#{rcvrId}, SYSDATE,#{dmndNo},#{hstryId},#{altType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ALERT SET IDNTY_YN = 1 WHERE ALT_NO = #{altNo}
